content: {A挠头}We really appreciate all of the work you've done on the planet. We want to ease your burden in any way we can. Please accept this small token of our gratitude. If you ever need anything, come see me at the Camp, hoho~!
info: 星球的桥-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I've been waiting for you! I heard from some of our Neighbors that ever since the bridge went up, it's been so much easier for everyone to get around.
info: 星球的桥-莫白_主流程文本3
